All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accumulator
The m150_ram.Accumulator class represents a simple accumulator that can load and store values from/to a m150_ram.Memory object.
ADD
The m150_ram.ADD class implements the m150_ram.Instruction interface and represents an instruction for performing addition in a computer program.
CommandLineUI
The CommandLineUI class provides a command-line user interface for interacting with a simulated machine's memory and executing a list of instructions.
HLT
The HLT (Halt) class implements the Instruction interface and represents an instruction for terminating the execution of a computer program.
Instruction
The Instruction interface represents an instruction that can be executed in a simulated machine.
InstructionList
The InstructionList class represents a list of instructions used in a simulated machine's program.
JMP
The JMP class implements the Instruction interface and represents an unconditional jump instruction in a computer program.
JMZ
The JMZ class implements the Instruction interface and represents a conditional jump instruction in a computer program.
LDA
The LDA class implements the Instruction interface and represents an instruction for loading a value from memory into the accumulator in a computer program.
LDI
The LDI (Load Immediate) class implements the Instruction interface and represents an instruction for loading an immediate value from memory into the accumulator in a computer program.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for a simulated program execution in a computer simulation.
Memory
The Memory class represents a simple memory storage with the ability to store and retrieve values in cells.
ProgramCounter
The ProgramCounter class represents a counter that tracks the current progress of a running program.
STA
The STA class implements the Instruction interface and represents an instruction for storing the current value of the accumulator in memory in a computer program.
STI
 
SUB
The m150_ram.SUB class implements the m150_ram.Instruction interface and represents an instruction for performing subtraction in a computer program.
TestAccumulator
JUnit test cases for the m150_ram.Accumulator class, which represents a simple accumulator that can load and store values from/to a m150_ram.Memory object.
TestADD
JUnit test cases for the m150_ram.ADD class, which represents an instruction for performing addition in a computer program.
TestHLT
JUnit test cases for the m150_ram.HLT class, which represents an instruction for terminating the execution of a computer program by clearing the memory and accumulator.
TestInstructionList
Test cases for the InstructionList class.
TestJMP
Test case for the JMP (Jump) instruction.
TestJMZ
 
TestLDA
Test case for the LDA (Load Accumulator) instruction.
TestLDI
 
TestMemory
Test cases for the Memory class.
TestProgramCounter
Test cases for the ProgramCounter class.
TestSTA
 
TestSTI
 
TestSUB
